extension.summary: Fork of the ExtendedInfo script from phil65 and OpenInfo
extension.description: This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins as well as a complete MovieDB browser including info dialogs for various media types. Needs skin implementation for lot of functions and WRP-MetaPlayer for library functions.
